website_summaries.verdict: A smooth desk pad featuring a lip to hold it in place, with room enough for laptop and mouse — no need for extra mousepad.
pros: ships flat so there are no creases in the surface
The smooth, glare-free blotter surface helps prevent eyestrain and is easy to keep clean
Stays in place without slipping, and the lip covers up sharp desk edges
cons: Although thicker than some pads, the surface is not cushioned
some users would like lip to span the entire front of pad

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Pad, Arrived Perfectly Flat  (See Photo)
customer_reviews.text: The desk pad arrived in a large flat box. It was not rolled folded, and came out perfectly flat. It is exactly what I was looking for at the price. It does not easily move or slip. Writing on it is great, and does not sink in slightly when writing on it, as I have found bulky leather desk pads to do. Would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan F

customer_reviews.title: It arrived folded so there was a bad crease and I thought over time the crease would ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived folded so there was a bad crease and I thought over time the crease would go away. Even after applying heat and placing heavy items for several days the crease is still there after several months.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk pad with edge protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking desk pad. My office desk has wood grain and it makes it hard to write on. This allows for a smooth writing surface (although it has a slight texture, my documents don't pick that up). The best part is the edge protector. It helps the pad stay in place and protects my desk from me rubbing against it. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Don't Care About It Not Being Real Leather
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It arrived in a flat box so it wasn't rolled up like a newspaper. It is just the perfect thickness and the lip on it works great for restricting movement of the pad. It doesn't slide around, at least not on my desk. Another thing I like about it is that no mouse pad is required, it works perfectly as the desk pad/mouse pad combo. Even though there is no claim by the seller that it is made out of leather, and it isn't, it is still very nice looking and quality made.
customer_reviews.author: docizincali

customer_reviews.title: The picture looks a lot better than the real thing
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks a lot better than the real thing. My pad was foldded from the center inside the shipping box. The folding left behind a permanent bulging crease along the center that just won't go away since I got it two months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly on my desk and my forearms feel great!
customer_reviews.text: The wood on my desk has some uneven spots which hit my forearms in all the wrong places. So, after a long period of working on my computer they get irritated. So, i bought this pad. It's stylish, soft seems to be good quality. So far, I think it has solved the problem I was having before. My forearms feel great! Definitely worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good For Desktop Protection
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. It is a nice mat for home/home office use. The material is durable and easy to clean. The lip that fits over the edge of the desk is the perfect feature for this product because it presents the mat from slipping on the wooden desk surface. I highly recommend this. The only reason it doesn't get a 5 star rating is because it wasn't shipped flat as described. Being rolled up is not a problem because it will quickly flatten, but the description is inaccurate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk pad, but not packaged properly.
customer_reviews.text: Product is nicely made, and the material seems durable. It covers the surface area needed well, and will work perfectly for it’s intended purpose. However, I’m not happy that the mat arrived folded in half in a box double it’s size. There was no reason it couldn’t have been laid flat inside the box. It’ll possible take some time and effort for it to de-crease and not have a hump down the middle to be a workable writing space.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm pleased. My desk has a pointed edge on it and I was getting cuts. I don't have that problem with this, the lip is great. When I recieved it, it did have a slight bump in it but I laid it flat in the heat and the bump already seems to be lessening. I'll just put something heavy on it until it flattens completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Really worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The texture is amazing! Not what I expected. Recommend purchasing wush I would have purchase this one 1st.
customer_reviews.author: B. Norvell Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Good size for my desk. Stays in position, thanks to the "lip" that overhangs the desk-front. A computer mouse works well on the surface of the pad. After continued good performance, my rating would be 5-star. After 6 months of use, this desk pad is the best I ever had. It is easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, but...
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the size of this mat and it is wide enough that I can put my laptop on it, both of my arms can rest beside the laptop and still be on the mat, and my mouse in right hands fits easily on the mat as well and works fine. My ONLY complaint is the mat has a few "pin head bumps" (imperfections) on the surface that if they were in the wrong place would disrupt the smooth movement of my mouse on the pad. Luckily the 3-4 raised dimples are not in any problem spots on this one for me. Overall I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: bherch

customer_reviews.title: It curled up and buckles.
customer_reviews.text: I changed my review, from 5 stars to went to 3 stars and now 1. After having purchased the mat in 2017, not only do the sides curl, but it buckles in the middle, it does not stay smooth on my desk no matter what I do or where I put my equipment, computer, monitor, etc. I do wish the lip was all the way across and a bit wider, maybe this would not have happened?
customer_reviews.author: redflower

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good quality desk pad for the money. It lays flat and fits well on my desk. Surface feels smooth and good to write on top of. The only imperfection was the circular spot, size of a dime on the picture. So far it seems to be durable and easy to clean, but not sure about the water resistance. Don't want to take the chance because it is artificial leather...
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this on Saturday. It was packaged well, slightly rolled. I took it out and unrolled it on the floor. Came back in a few hours and cleared off my desk so I could lay it out. Looked great. Small bubble still at the back that didn’t lay flat but it’s under the keyboard so i didn’t care. Now it’s Monday and it’s laying completely flat and the the lip is protecting the edge of my new desk from my chair and it gives me a great pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom in FL

customer_reviews.title: Works great, lip over edge keeps it in place
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat, it stays put and covers the edge of my desk preventing me from messing it up. It's a little soft for writing checks on but still totally usable. I use it as my mouse pad and works great, no intermittent mouse jumps or non-movement found with other smooth mats. This mat has a slight texture but is easy to keep clean/dusted.
customer_reviews.author: CJV

customer_reviews.title: Not as heat resistant as I would want
customer_reviews.text: I initially got one of those IKEA desk pads and ate a bowl of ramen on it and it bubbled up so fast from the heat. So I needed to find something else and I tried this product. It fared pretty well with a bowl of ramen but not from the laptop I had on the side that was blowing hot air onto it. It curled one of the corners of this mat. It's great looking and has a lot of life still in it, but I'm still on a mission to find a heat resistant laptop mat.
customer_reviews.author: Ballz

customer_reviews.title: After 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pad for several years and it has performed perfectly. Last week I purchased a different one for about $12 less but am returning it and buying a second one of these. It may have taken a few hours to get fully flat but it's been perfect for years.
customer_reviews.author: L Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as i expected
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these to make both of the deck have matched mat. From the first look, it was good. Later I found that somehow both of them have a little circle bump in the middle. Its not obvious if you don't take closer look. but i will expect the quality will be better with the price paid. I didn't return, it just too much hazel, but I won't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jess lee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Really love this and especially the edge feature. Had one previously that did not have the edge and my desk started to wear down. This stays in place, protects my desk, easy to clean and my mouse moves smoothly on it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: N. A.

customer_reviews.title: The edge protector is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to it is that the lip protection ends at the edges of the mat, and the material that this is made of is completely not usable as a mousepad (too much grip) so if you have a mousepad next to it the gap makes it awkward.
customer_reviews.author: stas

customer_reviews.title: This pad isn't artificial leather, and that's a good thing
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be what I was hoping it was going to be - a solid piece of semi rubbery plastic. It has a textured surface to provide traction and cut down on glare. it could slide around a little bit if you hit it just right, but it hasn't been a problem so far. Overall I'm pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: FireZeMissles

customer_reviews.title: Inferior shipping standard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because the description suggested it was shipped in a box that kept it flat. But when it arrived, the box is big enough but the blotter was simply loose and had folded in half in the bottom of the box. The crease it left has not gone away after two days so clearly it now has a permanent visible fold line. So in theory a good product, but be warned about how they carelessly package it for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: I1

customer_reviews.title: Deficient packaging
customer_reviews.text: It arrived folded and no matter what I have done, I cannot straighten it. It has a large warp in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Arrived flat, looks great, stays still.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged (shipped flat, no curling) and nice looking desk pad. Fits perfectly on my smaller home office desk. Haven’t used too much but the lip feature does seem to hold it in place quite well. Looks good to boot; No logos branded on it! (Unless I just haven’t noticed). We shall see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: The lip is quite nice to help line up the pad
customer_reviews.text: It's a kind of weird mat, but it works. There are some imperfections on the mat (blobs of texture, I guess you can say), but overall it protects the desk and does the job. I no longer need to use a mouse pad. The lip is quite nice to help line up the pad, but my desk has a curved edge. It doesn't get in the way much.
customer_reviews.author: Mykii

customer_reviews.title: Terrible disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this desk pad to replace one I've owned for 7 years. On the previous desk pad the rounded lip was beginning to wear out. I wanted a replacement with a fixation lip because the design is more comfortable on my wrists than the sharp edge of my desk. I was completely let down when my new desk pad arrived with damage along the rounded (fixation) lip. It's a huge disappointment that a brand new desk pad was somehow worse than my 7 year old one.
customer_reviews.author: Monico (Monico's Photography)

customer_reviews.title: For the price ok, nothing great.
customer_reviews.text: This is ok for what it is. It is nothing like artificial leather nor does it have any softness to it. The softness comes from its flexibility rather than the comfort it provides (which is little). Why in the world do they cover the picture with a book in the middle? Well because they injection point for the plastic is right in the middle and it shows in the middle of the surface. Disappointing in that respect. Overall for the price, its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bridget Cunningham-LaGuaria

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it came with a dimple smack dab in the middle of the desk portion. Not crazy about that but it was built well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: This desk pad was great initially. But, over time, the edges have started to curl up, no longer laying flat on the desk. This makes the pad almost unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Gant

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the pictures show.
customer_reviews.text: Still in packaging because it's not good quality. Pictures are deceiving. It's not as nice as the images. Way overpriced. One star is a generous rating.
customer_reviews.author: gjohnstun

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with no creases, great for keyboard/mouse pad
customer_reviews.text: The desk pad arrived as advertised in a large box, not folded and didnt have a crease. I didnt notice any discerning odor. The pad's texture is great as a mouse pad and can disguise most light scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Francis L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: I've set it up on my desk at work and it is very nice! It makes my work station look more professional. Really love it!
customer_reviews.author: O.TEUTLE

customer_reviews.title: Big area, wish it could lie flat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and wide area, with a lip to prevent pens/pencils from rolling off. It does have some permanent small curves/dips that we've not been able to flatten out with weighted objects even after a couple weeks, which is a symptom of how it was packed and shipped I guess. So you couldn't use it as a perfectly flat surface for drawing, for example. But for most other tasks it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Jellico

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I have a black one at work and a brown one for my home office. Great product, fits the space well. Cleans off easily and the color looks good. Excellent protection for my desk. I bought my husband one and he likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: MaggieS

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, cheap and dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Low quality, cheap and dirty. It's not worth the money. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it and now my desk is protected from things ...
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived to me in a large flat box so it was unbent. I love it and now my desk is protected from things like the metal zippers from my jacket. I bough it for the desk edge. The size is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit hard and smells Of plastic alottt when new later it fades away but I expected the consistency to be different slightly but I will Keep it as it protects my glass top table and doesn’t slip.
customer_reviews.author: LoyalCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product that does what is says it will do
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. The edge of my desk was being picked apart by inquisitive toddler fingers and looked terrible. This desk pad had a feature that I really needed to cover up that rough edge which was the lip that curves down over the edge of the desk. I usually don't give out 5 stars to any product because it inevitably fails expectations in one way or another, but in this case, this product deserves it. It is well made, just the right size and is preventing any further damage to the desk edge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the material is better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this and little big for my computer delk, but the material is better than expected. It looks to withstand many years of normal use. Very happy with purchase and item.
customer_reviews.author: Mckellim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk mat
customer_reviews.text: Great desk mat. Shipped flat so no curling. Thick material and non slip.
customer_reviews.author: tfunaoka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Desk Pad
customer_reviews.text: I read some product reviews that said theirs arrived rolled up or folded. I guess they have stopped doing that. Mine just arrived and it looks and feels awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Bought our third one.  Great product. Love the "stay-put" lip
customer_reviews.text: This is the best desk pad we have found. Comfortable and very durable. The lip keeps it in place, and also reduces the impact of the sharp desk edge on the hands and arms. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: arrived as described
customer_reviews.text: the pad came inside a large big box . no bend or anything. the pad material is just plastic. the product is worth maybe $15, and not $24.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice and flat. Little lip in center from manufacturing process but barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Gorilla Man

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best on the market! The lip is perfect for protecting the edge of your desk. 100000% should buy!
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but hard to get rid of the crease.
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that said this ships flat so it doesn't crease..... Incorrect. It was folded....and now I have this hump in the middle. I have set heavy books on it for three days now, and it isn't changing. I think I am going to heat it up to see if it'll unfold better. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Unlucky folding
customer_reviews.text: As noted by some other reviewers, the product is not packaged with a rigid support. Mine has some noticeable on the left and right sides, making it difficult to use a mouse on it. So far I haven't been able to flatten it out with weights or massaging under a warm kettle of water.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I like this mat a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this mat a lot. Good size and it fits my desk perfectly. It doesn't move around at all and my mouse works just fine on it. The only thing is there is a small bumpy point in the center of the mat but it's hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Xinuo Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but works
customer_reviews.text: Mine came slightly bent and not completely flat. It hasn't been a huge issue. It is pretty much like a door mat or place mat material. Really hard and stiff plastic. It does the job but may not be as aesthetically appealing as you think.
customer_reviews.author: Joselyn Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place, protects my desk
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on my desk, doesn't shift around due to the lip holding it in place. My mouse works on it, so I don't need a mouse pad. Surface keeps my laptop in place. Overall a good product. Actually bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great, except, just not wide enough!
customer_reviews.text: Why can't you make one that is closer to 34-36" in width? Do that I'll purchase a new one! I've found others wide enough, but they move around on me. No one can't make the perfect desk pad - unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just what I had been looking for. I only wish the lip went the length of the whole pad but not complaining. It is an nice pad
customer_reviews.author: A. L. PUTMAN

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good size, fabric, and color. Simple. Easy to place and use wherever. Is super helpful. Thank you. I love using it with my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tannehill

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but I have to give it 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I have to give it 3 stars because I receive wrong color. I order black, but I receive brown would love to return it but I need it to protect two new desk I purchase. Apart from the mix up.. Seems to be a great product l.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Ramnarain

customer_reviews.title: Needs quality control improvement
customer_reviews.text: After opening and testing the product I noticed the left side of the desk pad does not sit flush with the desk like the right side does. It is quite annoying, and quite visible. There isn't much I can do about it other than live with it. Better quality control would be the only solution for this going forward. If it weren't for that noticeable flaw I would rate this product much higher.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: I really dislike the feel of this as a mousepad
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike the feel of this as a mousepad. Also, the leather hurts my wrists when using it to place my keyboard on. It's also smaller than I was expecting--that's on me, though, I should have checked the measurements. The desk used in the picture is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great! Prefer this over the leather ones!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my desk where I spend hours studying, and I can write on loose-leaf pieces of paper w/o it being too "mushy". Looks sleek too. I like the little lip that goes alone the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Not too big, not too small. Plus it has a lip in the front to keep it in place. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Heidianabanana

customer_reviews.title: Best pad i ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Great office desk pad. I have had many over the years anf this one is far superior than any overpriced store bought pad. Highly recommend! I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered others but didn't like the quality. This desktop cover is good quality and I love the protection it gives my desk and my forearms from the edge of the desk. The other bonus is that I no longer need a mousepad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Don't bother buying anything else
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Don't bother buying anything else. This is great quality and arrived flat and in perfect condition. I would definitely buy it again if I ever had to!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Pelach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Arrived in perfect condition and protects my cheap desk!
customer_reviews.author: Tea Burdine

customer_reviews.title: This pad is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This pad is perfect for my needs. It looks exactly like the photo in the advertisement. No chemical odor. The pad was shipped flat. It did not curl or bend in shipping. I nearly did not purchase due to reviews about receiving the pad with creases. I purchased the pad to protect my glass desk while using my sewing machine. The sewing machine weighs over 20 pounds and has not left any marks or indentations on the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for protecting my wooden desktop and providing a smooth, easily cleaned work surface.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. My old desk was a little marred ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. My old desk was a little marred on the top. This covered it. With the lip it stays securely in place. It is also easy to clean and I love the size.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey considering it not genuine leather. Aside from that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it so much, he ordered a second one for his other desk.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Melott

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Good size, nice writing surface, and the lip is terrific for softening the edge I rest my wrists on while typing on my laptop. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish protection for my desk
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this desk mat. It looks sharp and fits well and is very protective of my desk..
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Waller

customer_reviews.title: Every desk should have this
customer_reviews.text: Going for a modern workspace? This is a must have. Very durable. Protects the desk. Great grip for keyboards and your pcs mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought this when I first purchased my desk. Very durable material. Easy to clean. If you spill something on it nothing leaks through. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great size and the outside lip helps keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, keeps me from scraping my forearms on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, keeps me from scraping my forearms on the edge of my desk and also works as a great mousepad.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee Paki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Like the way the overlap edge protects table edge. Just what I was looking for in my guestroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and came as ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Great protector for your desk and work space. Desk top saver for sure.....
customer_reviews.author: R. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This really keeps our desk looking nice. It is easy to clean and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: DC from NC

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on my desk
customer_reviews.text: I saw these at IKEA before I bought it on amazon. I love this thing! It prevents me from scratching up my desk and I use it as a mouse pad. Satisfied buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Giid product, fast shippinh
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and works as advertised. Showed up fast as well
customer_reviews.author: dan curtis

customer_reviews.title: Just need to be flattened.
customer_reviews.text: it didn't come completely flat. Just put some heavy books on top of it for a day then you are set.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Qi

customer_reviews.title: LOHOME DeskPads Artificial...
customer_reviews.text: I have an executive desk and I bought this pad to protected from scratches and I like it and I like the color it matches the desk
customer_reviews.author: Righty 13

customer_reviews.title: Great desk mat
customer_reviews.text: Great desk mat. Saves my desk and my arms from the sharp edges on the front of my metal desk. Love it! Also easy to clean and very durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice matt. I bought it for my office desk ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice matt. I bought it for my office desk to protect the surface from scratches and it does the job. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice & smooth on my desk for writing. Does not move around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pad. Better quality than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pad. Better quality than I was expecting. Very nicely packaged and arrives in perfect condition. Unrolled and left sitting overnight as it relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: David Roeder

customer_reviews.title: Mouse works great and it doesn’t scratch or show scratches
customer_reviews.text: No more mouse pads. This is perfect for office and professional use. Make sure u check size to get the right item.
customer_reviews.author: Placido Jr Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect! It arrived pretty quickly and in great shape
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! It arrived pretty quickly and in great shape. It protects the front edge of my desk perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Just DIY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for glass
customer_reviews.text: absolutely perfect for something to cover desk glass. It is awesome to write on as well
customer_reviews.author: VLBURKE

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Mouse works well on it
customer_reviews.text: Have used it now for a few days. Love it. Mouse works well on it.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Sood looking, simple design
customer_reviews.text: This simple desk pad delights me by its design which includes a lip that keeps it from sliding around. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: sS. R. Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Green desk mats
customer_reviews.text: I love the mats! However, they were packed folded so I had to weigh them down for 2 days. One I had to weigh an extra day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid desktop cover
customer_reviews.text: cleans well, stays flat, good value for the money. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CBO

customer_reviews.title: A nice pad.
customer_reviews.text: A nice pad...but there's a little notch in the middle the keeps it from being perfectly flat. Kinda annoys me, but usually the keyboard is over it.
customer_reviews.author: Keirmeister

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product. Just what I needed Looks and feels great. Be sure you measure your space.
customer_reviews.author: AlexofSB

customer_reviews.title: Pad is not as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Pad does not lay flat on surface. I placed over my desk and it has a clump that will not go flat, even after five weeks
customer_reviews.author: Sue F

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Well made thick plastic. Edge keeps it from moving and protects arms from sharp edge of desk. Had no problems with it laying flat. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: The lip on the front is my favorite feature as it keeps the pad in place. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice construction - worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Using this to protect my black desk. Nice and thin. I am able to write (on paper) without issues. Also, my mouse works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joylene

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, protects the old library table top it ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what I expected. Nice size, protects the old library table top it was put on, and it does not move around. Still need to use a mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it is very high quality material and cleans up easy.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a large desk area this is a must have and i must say it is very high quality material and cleans up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matias_G
